Comment: Jointly with the Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: Resolution rejecting the proposals of the President’s Advisory Panel on Federal Tax Reform to eliminate the deductibility of state and local taxes and replace the deduction for mortgage interest and calling upon the President and Congress to reject these proposals as well and to index the alternative minimum tax (AMT) for inflation.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Proposals of the President’s Advisory Panel on Federal Tax Reform to eliminate the deductibility of state and local taxes.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Resolution rejecting the proposals of the President’s Advisory Panel on Federal Tax Reform to eliminate the deductibility of state and local taxes and replace the deduction for mortgage interest and calling upon the President and Congress to reject these proposals as well and to index the alternative minimum tax (AMT) for inflation.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Proposals of the President’s Advisory Panel on Federal Tax Reform to eliminate the deductibility of state and local taxes.
